2016.zoroark.bundle.3: Zoroark’s Stand In Ability allows it to leap into battle at any time, and its Mind Jack attack can take advantage of your opponent’s forces! You’ll also get two XY—BREAKthrough booster packs, plus a set of card sleeves and a Zorua card!
2016.zoroark.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 2 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough booster packs (10-card) 1 Zoroark Pokémon card (XY—BREAKthrough, 91/162) 1 Zorua Pokémon card (XY—BREAKthrough, 89/162) Card sleeves These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through July 18, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.promo.pallosand.sleeve.description: Give your deck a spooky look with card sleeves featuring the menacing Palossand!\n\nThis offer runs through April 23, 2017.
2017.promo.pallosand.sleeve.name: Palossand Card Sleeves
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.b.descriptio: Throw your Pokémon into battle! A swirling Poké Ball keeps your deck looking sharp.
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.b.name: Crystalline Poké Ball Card Sleeves
